issue.title: Fix user guide to describe new usage of kp_velocity and provide description

content.raw:
Ah. Right.  I mis-read after looking at the position term above for "positionTarget".

So is the kp_velocity term used in the solver in addition to the physical damping defined with set\_joint\_damping?

can you point me to the relevant code in solver?
